title: Emperor Battle For Dune+1.09 Patch+Map Packs+Install fix
description:
Emperor Battle For Dune
Awesome RTS game from Westwood Studios based on the Dune universe.

This torrent comes in a self extracting 7z file.

Instructions:
- Mount EMPEROR INSTALL .mds file with the vortual drive of your choice, alcohol, poweriso etc.
- Extract EMPENGINSTFIX10, and follow the instructions to install Emperor on newer operating systems
- Update the game with included Emperor 1.09 patch included.
- (Optional) Extract map packs in order 1-4 to Emperor's Data directory.
- Launch the game and after the fmv choose your faction.
- Each faction has its own disc which are included in .mdf files which should be mounted when prompted to insert disc.

Files included in this torrent:
- Emperor Install .mdf
- Emperor Atreides .mdf
- Emperor Harkonnen .mdf
- Emperor Ordos .mdf
- Emperor Patch 1.09
- Emperor serial key
- Emperor Install Fix (EMPENGINSTFIX10)
- 4 x Map packs and campaign map unlocker.

Credit for the map packs and install fix goes to all the great people at http://dune2k.com

Also check out the http://dune2k.com forums for info on setting up the game for multiplayer, or just use tunngle :P
